name: Ghoul
description: A malformed victim of a vampire attack that didn't die. They are consumed with a lust for flesh and will attack anything, even other ghouls, if they are hungry enough.

0.name: Bite
0.description: The ghoul bites one target within 2m.

1.name: Claw Swipe
1.description: The ghoul swipes at one target within 2m with its claws.

0.name: Poison Immunity
0.description: Ghouls are immune to all poisons and the Poisoned status effect.

1.name: Vulnerability
1.description: Ghouls take double damage from fire and cold iron.

2.name: Necrophage
2.description: The ghoul can take a bite of a corpse, instantly healing 1d6 Wounds. This cannot bring it below 0 Wounds (full health).
